column4: can anyone help me find and bakcup some files saved inside a virtual machine (windows)

you didnt say that part ;)
define wont boot?

go into your boot partition. manuver your way to your VM installation
please use tab completion or spell my name right
I'm sorry. Is it ok if I mount in the same directory? (sudo mount /dev/sda1/ /mnt/)
That`s the directory where I have mounted the second partition

you cant mount a partition .. to a place where something is already mounted
just mkdir a new place
like.. mkdir /mnt/vm or something
